subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Joaquim Rodríguez powered up the final ascent of the mountainous 15th stage of the Vuelta a España, reducing Fabio Aru’s overall lead to just one second.
snippet: Joaquim Rodríguez powered up the final ascent of the mountainous 15th stage of the Vuelta a España, reducing Fabio Aru’s overall lead to just one second.
